title: Klepper Podcast - How Community Helps Veterans Recover from Trauma - Uncensored
itunes:title: Klepper Podcast - How Community Helps Veterans Recover from Trauma - Uncensored
description:
Jordan Klepper discusses his time with a group of veterans who uses wrestling to treat PTSD and talks to "Tribe" author Sebastian Junger about how isolation worsens trauma. 

Subscribe to the Klepper podcast: apple.co/2KUaH87

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
